projectGridLines.title: Reducing Customer Call Volume
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Analyze frequent customer call topics to understand root causes. Suggest innovative solutions to

reduce high-volume call topics. Perform impact analysis of implemented initiatives and proactively report

anomalies and insights for further improvements.

Skill sets: Data analysis (expertise in SQL), Root cause analysis, Problem-solving, Reporting

Traits expectation: Analytical thinking, Details oriented, Problem Solving

Expected learning: Gain hands-on experience in reducing customer support call volumes through data-driven

insights. Learn to perform impact analysis, track metrics, and suggest process improvements in a real-world

setting. Enhance problem-solving and analytical skills.

projectGridLines.title: Increasing Repeat Transactions
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Investigate reasons behind low repeat transactions after the first transaction. Deep dive into system

and data setups, add missing instrumentation, and derive actionable insights to boost successive transactions.

Identify patterns and recommend strategies to enhance user retention.

Skill sets: Data analysis (expertise in SQL), Instrumentation setup, User behavior analysis, Reporting

Traits expectation: Analytical thinking, Details oriented, Problem Solving

Expected learning: Understand user transaction behavior and learn to increase user retention through data

insights. Gain experience in data setup and instrumentation and develop strategies for improving user engagement

and repeat transactions.

projectGridLines.title: Analyzing Game Play Flows
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Analyze daily game play flows, understand underlying APIs and error codes, and detect anomalies.

Initially focus on spotting anomalies through data observation. Gradually recommend solutions for fixing these

anomalies to ensure smooth game play experiences.

Skill sets: API understanding, Error code analysis, Anomaly detection, Data analysis

Traits expectation: Analytical thinking, Details oriented, Problem Solving

Expected learning: Develop skills in analyzing game play flows and detecting anomalies through data

observation. Learn to understand APIs and error codes, and recommend solutions to enhance the gaming

experience. Gain experience in data-driven decision-making and system optimization.

projectGridLines.title: Building Variable Rewards System
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Develop a variable rewards system including quests, scratch cards, and spin-to-win features.

Understand gamification principles, create engaging reward constructs, and coordinate with marketing and

business teams to implement these features in the CRM. Ensure alignment with organizational goals and user

engagement strategies.

Skill sets: Understanding of gamification, Reward system design, Coordination with teams, CRM integration

Traits expectation: Creative thinking, Team Collaboration, Communication, Detail Oriented

Expected learning: Learn to design and implement a variable rewards system using gamification principles.

Gain experience in coordinating with marketing and business teams, and understand the integration of game

constructs into CRM. Develop skills in creating engaging user experiences and driving user engagement through

rewards.
